ValidationRule.description: If Rate, Quantity or Multiplier, then both Rate and Quantity need to be filled in.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Contract', AND(OR(NOT(ISBLANK(UnitPrice)), NOT(ISBLANK(Quantity)), NOT(ISBLANK( ia_crm__Multiplier__c ))), OR(ISBLANK(UnitPrice), ISBLANK(Quantity))), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incomplete input data is provided for 'Rate', 'Quantity', and 'Multiplier'.
